Airshadow, can you specify which base/bot/area you're in/near? It would be 
much easier to reply then.

::Kluster::

Kluster frowns, not liking this situation at all. The bot seemed to be making 
things up as he went along.

"If he was already reprogrammed, why did he try to help a Predacon?" Kluster 
asks, his voice filled with his doubt of this bot's words.
